## Key Features

### ğŸ¯ Automatic Detection
- Compares local `.csproj` versions with NuGet.org
- Only publishes new versions
- Skips already-published packages

### ğŸš€ Parallel Processing
- Multiple packages publish simultaneously
- Independent failure handling
- Faster deployment

### ğŸ”’ Security
- API keys stored in GitHub Secrets
- Never exposed in logs
- Scoped permissions

### ğŸ“Š Monitoring
- GitHub Actions logs
- Workflow summaries
- Automatic issue creation

### ğŸ›ï¸ Control
- Manual workflow triggers
- Force publish option
- Selective package publishing
